name: Faction Warfare
description: Protecting the Gallente Federation's interests and defending against threats from other factions.
goals: Secure 5 key systems from enemy factions within the next year.

name: Galactic Democracy Expansion
description: Aiming to expand democratic principles across the galaxy, promoting freedom and cooperation among nations.
goals: Establish democratic governments in 5 new systems within the next year.
progress: 2 more systems are in the process of transitioning

name: Intergalactic Cultural Exchange
description: Fostering cultural understanding and exchange between the Gallente Federation and other interstellar nations.
goals: Host 10 cultural exchange events across the galaxy within the next 6 months.

name: Space Exploration Initiative
description: Exploring the unknown reaches of the galaxy, expanding our knowledge and pushing the boundaries of space travel.
goals: Explore 3 new star systems within the next year.
progress: 1 new star system has been explored

name: Environmental Sustainability
description: Protecting the environment and promoting sustainable practices throughout the galaxy.
goals: Reduce carbon emissions by 20% in the next 2 years.
progress: Implementation of eco-friendly technologies in 5 systems

name: Interstellar Education
description: Providing access to quality education for all citizens across the galaxy, promoting knowledge and understanding.
goals: Establish 10 new educational institutions in underdeveloped systems within the next 3 years.

name: Galactic Health Initiative
description: Improving healthcare services and promoting healthy living across the galaxy.
goals: Reduce mortality rates by 15% in the next year.
progress: Implementation of advanced medical research in 3 systems
